typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	PathWildcard as string ('Ventas')
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:[($PathWildcard +'*.csv')],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> fuenteVentasCSV
DerivedColumn2 derive() ~> DerivedColumn1
Join1 derive() ~> DerivedColumn2
DerivedColumn3 join(joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Select1 derive() ~> DerivedColumn3
fuenteVentasCSV select(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
